name: DBSubnetGroup
shortDesc: The AWS::RDS::DBSubnetGroup type creates an RDS database subnet group. Subnet groups must contain at least two subnet in two different Availability Zones in the same region.

properties.name: DBSubnetGroupDescription
properties.desc: The description for the DB Subnet Group.

properties.name: SubnetIds
properties.desc: The EC2 Subnet IDs for the DB Subnet Group.

properties.name: Tags
properties.desc: The tags that you want to attach to the RDS database subnet group.
